scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w frontend && npm run typecheck -w backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w frontend || true && npm run lint -w backend || true
scripts.test: npm run test -w backend || true && npm run test -w frontend || true
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist backend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules node_modules
